entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -23.5°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
